lead_paragraph: Fifty-five were injured in the attack, which targeted a bus carrying soldiers on weekend leave in the city of Kayseri.

headline.print_headline: 13 Soldiers Die in Bus Attack in Turkey
headline.main: Bombing in Turkey Kills 13 Soldiers and Wounds Dozens More

snippet: Fifty-five were injured in the attack, which targeted a bus carrying soldiers on weekend leave in the city of Kayseri....
